Class CompositeFilter

java.lang.Object
CompositeFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
be.uliege.montefiore.oop.audio.Filter, CompositeFilterInterface
public class CompositeFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements CompositeFilterInterface
Implementation of the CompositeFilter class which is an extension of the Filter class.
Author:
Maxime GOFFART (180521) and Olivier JORIS (182113).
